CreatePath2
CRefObj<IPath2> CreatePath2(
std::vector<Vector2> points,
float tolerance
)

Creates a new path by fitting a set of beziers to the specified points

Parameters
points
std::vector<Vector2>

list of points to fit cubic Beziers to

float

tolerance for the fit
